mdl-product.title: Products
mdl-product.productFeaturesTooltip: Product features depend on the product type. Changing features will affect UOM.

empty.title: No products yet
empty.description: Create your first product to get started.

product-create.definePackaging: Define packaging options for this variant
product-create.baseUomDescription: This is the base unit of measure (UOM) of the product, and also the storage unit (if stockable feature is enabled). Should choose the smallest unit to avoid conversion errors.
product-create.baseUomWarning: Note: This unit cannot be changed after creating the product.
product-create.captureAttributes: Capture additional attributes for this variant
product-create.duplicateUomMessage: This UOM is already selected in another field
product-create.duplicateUomDescription: This UOM is already selected in another field

errors.baseUnitOfMeasureRequired: Base unit of measure is required
errors.conversionRatioRequired: Conversion ratio is required and must be greater than 0
errors.atLeastOneVariantRequired: At least one variant is required
errors.masterImageRequired: At least one image is required for the master product

uom-section.confirmDeleteUomMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this UOM?
uom-section.deleteUomMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this UOM?
